snippet: A man arrested in the killing of a 4-year-old migrant boy from Bosnia has confessed to killing another child, prosecutors said.
abstract: German prosecutors report arrest of suspect in October abduction and  murder of four-year-old Bosnia migrant, Mohamed Januzi; say suspect, identified only as German man Silvio S, confessed to sexually assaulting and killing Mohamed, and murdering six-year-old Elias Sturm in July.
lead_paragraph: A man arrested in the killing of a 4-year-old migrant boy from Bosnia has confessed to killing another child, prosecutors said.
